plot outline: 1 Pandhu 4 Run 1 Wicket, with its quirky title, is a cricket-based silent horror film. The story revolves around a cricket fanatic, who is watching an India versus Pakistan final match. What happens in the last ball of the match becomes very crucial from the story's perspective.
title: 1 Pandhu 4 Run 1 Wicket
plot: _1 Pandhu 4 Run 1 Wicket_ (qv), with its quirky title, is a cricket-based silent horror film. The story revolves around a cricket fanatic, who is watching an India versus Pakistan final match. What happens in the last ball of the match becomes very crucial from the story's perspective.
